Class Simulator

java.lang.Object
Simulator
public class Simulator extends Object
The main class that simulates the operations of the computer

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Simulator(int size)
    Creates a simulator instance with memory of size size

  • Constructor Details

    • Simulator

      public Simulator(int size)
      Creates a simulator instance with memory of size size
      Parameters:
      size - the size of the memory for this simulated computer in 16-bit words

  • Method Details

    • step

      public void step()
      Performs a single step of machine execution: executing the instruction in the IR.

    • executeInstruction

      public void executeInstruction()
      Executes the instruction specified by the contents of the IR.

    • load

      public void load()
      Loads from memory the contents at the address specified by the MAR into the MBR.

    • store

      public void store()
      Stores in memory the contents in MBR at the address specified by the MAR.

    • updateRegister

      public void updateRegister(String name, int[] v)
      Sets the register with name n to have the value v.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the register having its value set
      v - the array of integers (each of which should be zero or one) that this register is being set to

    • getRegister

      public int[] getRegister(String name)
      Returns the value of the register with name name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the register whose value is returned
      Returns:
      an int array of only zeros and ones giving the value of the register of name name

    • incrementPC

      public void incrementPC()
      Increments the PC.

    • giveInterface

      public void giveInterface(Interface I)
      Gives a reference to an interface object so that this simulator can update/notify the interface when changes occur and it can update accordingly.
      Parameters:
      I - the interface object being given to this simulator

    • registerCopy

      public void registerCopy(int[] from, int[] to)
      Copies the value from the from register to the to register.
      Parameters:
      from - the register from which a value is being copied
      to - the register to which a value is being copied
